phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
While the members of the Golden Dawn were stopping
the Diamond troops from invading Kiten,
Yami asked Vangeance something that had been bothering him for a long time.
Vangeance...
Could you take off that mask?
Yami, you suspect that I may be the leader of the Eye of the Midnight Sun, do not you?
Very well.
Sorry about that.
As Asta and Yuno were reunited during this battle and renewed their ambitions...
We are both working to become the Wizard King!
Never Again
Sounds like a lively bunch has arrived.
Are you just not satisfied unless you are fighting something?
Huh?
My head!
It is going to crack!
It is going to break!
Is that what is wrong with you?
My body is moving on its own?!
Well, whatever.
You fought despite how broken you are.
Captain Yami, I cannot!
Please!
Spare me, please!
Have him take a look at you and your head.
I think my head's being affected more now than it usually is!
Hey, Yami.
Come on in.
Who are you?
This guy, who looks completely out of place in this tower,
is the kingdom's best quack doctor.
You might have gathered that from how he looks.
That is so rude!
He managed to reattach one of my arms after it almost fell off before,
so he is a great recovery mage.
Have him check you out.
I am going to get even more injured!
Are you all right?
Recovery Mage Who Works Directly Under the Wizard King Owen
I am Owen, a recovery mage who works directly under the Wizard King.
Pleasure to meet you.
I am Asta!
Thanks for seeing me!
I hear all about you when I go out drinking with Yami.
Really?!
Yeah.
I heard that you can nullify magic.
Who knew such magic existed?
He works directly under the Wizard King?
Even I know what that means!
He must be an incredible quack doctor!
Welp, I have got something I got to take care of.
I have got a good feeling that I am going to win today.
You are going gambling, are not you?
May Lady
Luck be with you!
Jeez...
Yami's younger than me, but he is much bolder.
It is so irritating.
He is not a bad guy, though.
Yup!
Well, have a seat.
Yes, sir.
Now, then...
Let us see.
Water Recovery Magic: Qualle Operation.
Wow, they got you good, did not they?
But do not you worry.
My spell sees through the body of the person it envelops,
so I can get a clear look at the affected area and heal it with precision.
Yami's amazing, but you have got some amazing muscles yourself.
I work out!
Now for some mana to promote healing...
Man, I finally got out of Kiten.
Just how many captives did the Golden Dawn take?
Let us see, where is Asta...
Whoa, what the heck is that?!
Jellyfish... recovery magic?
Asta...
Oh, hey, Finral.
Sorry to keep you waiting.
Oh, hey, Asta.
No worries.
Yami should show up any minute now.
Hey!
Captain Yami, did you...
I was on fire today!
What is with the huge bag?
Huh?
Forget it.
Let us just go home.
Hurry up with the spatial magic, Finral.
Okay...
All right, listen up.
I am pretty sure some of you noticed,
but we have earned so many stars lately that we are actually out of the hole.
This is all thanks to you dumbasses working hard.
So eat all this meat!
Swoosh!
Swooshy, whooshy, whooshy, whoosh!
Meat!
Here!
There!
Everywhere!
All of the meat!
So good!
Mister Yami's actually treating us!
Today's a damn holiday!
I am going to eat a lifetime's worth of meat!
Marie, I will only serve you the best meat.
Here you go, Marie.
I have cooked this meat to just above 55 degrees Celsius, just high enough
to make sure you do not get food poisoning, but below 60 degrees Celsius,
since that would make it tough.
It is the best-cooked meat possible.
This is his own personal opinion
Say, Aah.
It is so good!
Magna, want to kill each other over this hunk of meat?
Of course not, you idiot!
Aw, come on!
Is there anything more blissful than this?
I can barely stand it.
It is so hot!
But so good!
P-Pwease dun mook at muh ben I am meating!
It is embarrassing!
You only eat barbecue with those who are special to you.
Asta and I are special friends who share the same meat...
Asta, you cannot eat with your arms like that, right?
Y-You are so helpless.
I will just have to feed you myself...
Woohoo!
I can eat with my feet now!
I guess people can learn to do anything!
You filthy peasant!
All right, Finral!
Show us a trick!
Huh?
O-Oh, sure...
Secret Technique: Stop Hitting Yourself!
All right!
You are next, Charmy!
Secret Technique: Instant Disappearing Meat!
La, la, la...
All you did was eat it instantly!
All right, Grey!
You are next!
Do something!
I cannot!
Shut up and do something!
S-Secret Technique: M*** ***xe!
You just turned into what you usually turn into!
Wow, everyone is so amazing.
Everyone has their own special skill.
I have something that I have been secretly practicing.
Do you mind if I show you guys?
Special Technique: Crackling Magna Typhoon!
Secret Technique: Meaty Sheepy Peacock!
Next, I will work out!
That is not a special trick at all!
Man, I am exhausted.
I am going to call it a night!
Well, all right.
Make sure you get plenty of rest!
Great work, everyone!
Is not Asta acting a bit weird?
Yeah...
I mean, when does he ever get tired?
Exactly.
He just seems off today.
Maybe I will go cheer him up.
Maybe if we try to kill each other, he will feel better.
He will feel better if he eats some more meat, la!
I wonder if something happened.
F-F-Forget I said anything!
Now that you mention it, the angle of his smile
seemed a little lower than usual...
Marie...
Guys, I have something to tell you.
I overheard something when Asta was getting healed.
The doctor said that Asta's arms
will never go back to normal.
What?
What... are you saying?
It looks like some kind of ancient curse has been placed upon them.
On top of that, the bones are shattered.
I am very sorry, but I will not be able to heal you with the magic I have now.
A curse, huh?
Impressive...
You managed to draw me out, human.
If that is what the best recovery mage in the Clover Kingdom said,
then there is no doubt about it.
No...
Just when I thought I would found the ultimate partner...
This is way too harsh.
The boy has no magic... and now he cannot even use his only weapon?
La...
Unbelievable...
Asta...
You will never be able to swing your sword again.
You will never be able to swing your sword again.
Asta...
Like hell I am going to give up!
You just had to mess with me again, did not you, fate?!
But you are just firing me up more, you bastard!
I am going to find a way to fix these arms, no matter what!
Or I will find some kind of strength that let us me fight without my arms!
And you have no magic whatsoever.
You must have been born that way.
Then no matter how hard I try, I will not be able to use magic?
Just give up on everything.
You were born a loser!
I am just going to give...
That one time was the very last time
I am ever going to feel depressed!
Just you wait, you bastard!
Asta...
Now that that is settled, time to train!
Damn straight, kid.
That is one hot-blooded guy, damn it!
Way to go, Asta.
Yup!
I am going to share my snacks with him later, la.
H-His optimism is absolutely amazing!
I believe in you.
His courage is admirable, but I will not let him near Marie.
Admirable courage, though.
Just you wait, Yuno!
That is right.
You cannot give up, boy.
Magic from that country might be able to save you!
Good morning, everyone!
Huh?
There is usually someone in here making things lively...
Did something about the base change again?
Did everyone already head out somewhere for the day?
Hell if I know.
Is everyone just slacking off?
They were partying pretty hard yesterday...
I sense someone is ki.
You cannot hide from me!
That is Noelle and Finral.
What are they up to?
Okay, we were able to send basically everyone off.
I wish they would all stop being so secretive.
Asking me to send them places because something came up,
or they suddenly remembered they had to be somewhere...
I know they are all sneaking away to try and find a cure for Asta.
Huh?
Though I guess since they are not technically going on missions,
Yami might get mad at them.
Not to mention, Asta would probably say something like,
Forget about me!
Please put any missions first!
Well, this place looks pretty rough.
You scared, Magna?
Like hell I am!
I am actually super excited!
Magna and Luck went to search some dungeon in a barren part of the Forsaken Realm.
Just you wait, Asta!
Gauche and Gordon are researching hexes at the royal library.
I want to hurry up and fix Asta's arms so I can hold his hand.
Our bond will get even stronger if I can heal his wounds.
We will be friends forever.
Yes, BFFs...
Stop mumbling and search, damn it.
100 Spells
That will Help You Become an Older Brother Your Little Sister Will Adore.
Marie...
A Beginner's Guide to Ancient Hexes That Even a Monkey Could Understand
Well...
I guess it might make Marie sad if he does not get better.
Gauche is actually putting someone else before his sister for once.
I need to work harder.
Charmy and Grey went to search for some unknown ingredients that work against curses.
Grey
Just you wait, Asta!
I will find you something that will cure your curse, fill your tummy, and be yummy!
That is...
I have no idea what it is, but it smells delicious, la!
But I have to hold back!
Cotton Creation Magic: Sheep Bondage!
All right!
Let us keep moving forward, la!
Who would have thought that the members of the worst, lowest,
and crudest squad would be working so hard for one newbie?
No kidding.
Especially for such a dumb, reckless,
vulgar, no-magic peasant like him.
You do not have to try so hard anymore,
you filthy little rat that wandered into the wrong place.
What the heck is that peasant from the boonies saying?
You cannot do a thing in this world.
Even though he does not have any magic,
he just refuses to give up.
Even though he does not have any magic,
he is the first one into the battle, and he fights harder than anyone else.
And because he is like that,
Asta was able to give us the strength to fight.
Now, it is our turn to help him fight!
That always frustrated me.
But I sure was blessed with amazing friends...
Those dumbasses.
If only they would work this hard at their regular jobs.
All right, Noelle!
Why do not we also go look for somewhere promising together Crunch.
Sorry, but there is somewhere I would like you to take me.
You can go wherever you want on your own.
What?
Where are you going?
I see!
They might know something that we do not.
Come to think of it...
Where the heck did Vanessa go?
She disappeared before anyone else.
Maybe she has some kind of lead herself.
I do not have any time to waste, either.
Hurry up and take me.
Maybe remember you are asking your senior for a favor...
But, yeah, okay.
Coming.
Looks like he is home.
I am coming in!
Oh, hey.
I just got out of the bath
Petit Clover!
100 Spells
That will Help You Become an Older Brother Your Little Sister Will Adore
100 Spells
That will Help You Become an Older Brother Your Little Sister Will Adore.
First, please evaluate yourself.
What type of older brother are you?
What would you do if your sister fell in love with someone?
Question 1: What would you do if your sister fell in love with someone?
A, Watch over them from the shadows
A: Watch over them from the shadows.
B, Aggressively try to talk to her about it
B: Aggressively try to talk to her about it.
C: Absolutely refuse to allow this relationship to happen.
C, Absolutely refuse to allow this relationship to happen
D: Other.
D, Other (Fill in)
Murder him
Question 2: You see your sister holding hands with another man.
What do you do?
A, Pretend you did not see it
A: Pretend you did not see it.
B, Greet them quickly, then leave
B: Greet them quickly, then leave.
C, Aggressively go talk to them
C: Aggressively go talk to them.
D, Other (Fill in)
D: Other.
Murder him
Evaluation results...
You fail as a human being, much less a big brother
You fail as a human being, much less a big brother.
Reflect Ray!
Let us take good care of library books
Let us concentrate on how to enjoy being alone instead of making friends
100 Spells to Help You Make Friends
Let us take good care of library books
That is right, Asta!
You would better not give up!
Not giving up is our magic!
Black Clover, Page 55: The Man Named Fanzell.
Page 55 The Man Named Fanzell
I do not care if I have to go to the ends of the earth!
I will find a way to cure you!
